mt:Texts.mt:Texts: Next, we will go over walking in MRET.
Open the menu, and navigate to the Locomotion section.
Select the "walking" button with the trigger, and deselect the "teleportation" button.
Note: you can have multiple locomotion modes active at once, so make sure to turn off what you do not want to use.
Now walk down the hallway and enter the next part of the tutorial!
